name: Global Yield Asset Management
description: Global Yield Asset Management (GYLD) is an innovative investment firm specializing in yield-driven investment strategies. Founded in 2010, GYLD focuses on maximizing returns for its clients through a diversified portfolio that includes equities, fixed income, real estate, and alternative investments. The firm employs a disciplined approach to asset allocation and risk management, leveraging advanced analytics and market insights to identify opportunities across global markets. GYLD is committed to sustainable investing, integrating environmental, social, and governance (ESG) criteria into its investment processes to ensure long-term value creation. With a team of experienced professionals, GYLD aims to deliver consistent performance while maintaining a strong focus on client relationships and transparency. The company's investment philosophy is centered on understanding market dynamics and adapting strategies to meet the evolving needs of investors. GYLD also offers a range of products, including mutual funds, exchange-traded funds (ETFs), and separately managed accounts, catering to both institutional and individual investors. The firm’s mission is to empower clients to achieve their financial goals through strategic investment management and exemplary service.

seo.meta_title: Global Yield Asset Management | Yield-Driven Investment Strategies
seo.meta_description: Explore Global Yield Asset Management's innovative investment strategies focused on yield and sustainability. Learn about our diverse product offerings and commitment to client success.

faq.answer: Global Yield Asset Management is headquartered in New York, New York, USA.

faq.answer: GYLD offers mutual funds, ETFs, and separately managed accounts.

faq.answer: Global Yield Asset Management was founded in 2010.
